description: The United Kingdom's media regulator found the BBC in "serious breach" of rules after the broadcaster featured the son of an Hamas official as the narrator in a documentary.

title: President Donald Trump commutes former New York GOP Rep. George Santos' prison sentence
description: President Donald Trump announced he had signed the commutation of disgraced former Representative George Santos after he was sentenced to 87 months in prison Friday.
content:
President Donald Trump announced on Truth Social Friday that he commuted the sentence of disgraced former Rep. George Santos, R-N.Y., after several campaign finance violations.
